title: the state of braum sickens me
body: his identity is literally a giant meat shield. yet for some reason, over half of the cast including mages, assassins, and adcs have more base health than him. seriously why am i walking around with sub 600 base hp as what is supposed to be the primo tank support

replies.body: Because tanks are expected to buy or otherwise choose additional defensive options (health, resistances, active items, etc.) that synergize with whatever makes them tanky.
Hey KFC. How may more times do you think I will end up explaining to folks that tanks tank Via positioning and ability usage rather then statballing?
